title: Media Companies Still Hoping for ‘Build Back Better’ Windfall
sub_head: Can’t Pelosi and Schumer say no to anything?
body:
With so many worthy candidates, it’s hard to select the most unproductive and unwise item in the multitrillion-dollar inflation-feeder known as Build Back Better. But in the pending bill’s long list of unnecessary federal expenditures, there’s one provision that seems to sum up the entire bill’s disconnection from the principal issues facing the country. How many voters believe that the problem with our society is that there’s not enough government assistance to the media industry?
Unfortunately Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi (D., Calif.) and Senate Majority Leader Charles Schumer (D., N.Y.) have embraced the ethos of social justice warriors: Leave No Man’s Subsidy Behind.
